title: Jordan Peterson Roundup First Week of April 2018
description:
In Politico Magazine https://www.politico.com/magazine/story/2018/04/08/jordan-peterson-beating-pundits-own-game-217773

In the Catholic Register https://www.catholicregister.org/opinion/guest-columnists/item/27085-herman-goodden-outspoken-prof-is-church-s-ally 

Alan Jacobs Sad Compatibilism http://text-patterns.thenewatlantis.com/2018/04/sad-compatibilism.html 

Alastair Roberts https://alastairadversaria.com/2018/04/06/discourse-in-the-culture-wars-and-the-hunger-for-catharsis/ 

Public Discourse on Adam and Eve http://www.thepublicdiscourse.com/2018/04/21281/ 

NYT Canadian piece https://www.nytimes.com/2018/04/06/opinion/jordan-peterson-canadian-deference.html

JBP as Substitute for God https://stream.org/jordan-peterson-lead-people-god/ 

Ron Dart on Brad Jersak channel https://youtu.be/lz5VuV-gtDI
